attributes.action: Make Monday 12th July a bank holiday if England get to the Euro 2020 final
attributes.additional_details: To bring the nation together after a couple of years of dealing brexit and then a global pandemic, this would be a perfect way to allow people to celebrate ready for our unlocking.
attributes.background: If England get to the Euro 2020 final the game kicks off at 8pm on the Sunday. Make the Monday a bank holiday in order to allow everyone to enjoy the experience and allow pubs extended opening hours.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584

Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
